code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ProductModal from'./ProductModal';import products from'../mock/products';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Productos=()=>{const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState(null);const handleCategoryClick=category=>{setSelectedCategory(category);};const handleCloseModal=()=>{setSelectedCategory(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center mb-8",children:"Nuestros Productos Personalizados"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:Object.keys(products).map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>handleCategoryClick(category),className:"bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden cursor-pointer transform transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-xl duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:products[category].image,alt:products[category].category,className:"w-full h-64 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-center",children:products[category].category})})]},category))}),selectedCategory&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductModal,{category:products[selectedCategory].category,products:products[selectedCategory].items,onClose:handleCloseModal})]});};export default Productos;
